scripts.gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm version patch && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Build dist/' && git push origin master --tags && npm run update-gh-pages
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm version minor && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Build dist/' && git push origin master --tags && npm run update-gh-pages
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm version major && npm run build && git commit -a -m 'Build dist/' && git push origin master --tags && npm run update-gh-pages
